skins.selfIntroduction: I am the nameship of the Trento class, but if you count the days since our launches, Trieste has a longer service record. Speaking of which, I had a little incident on my launch day... but I still carried out my missions as a member of the Sardegnian fleet~
skins.acquisition: I am Trento, first heavy cruiser of the Sardegna Empire, here to help out. I'll support everyone in my own special little way, so please do look forward to that, Commander?
skins.login: Right on time~ Way to go, Commander~!
skins.details: Umm... What was I doing just now? Do you have any ideas, Commander...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: You've already finished all the paperwork? That's great~!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Tea blends, let's see... Hmm, would any Royal girls take issue with this mix? Yeah, they might...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Looks like I'll get to enjoy both the Dragon Empery's AND the Sakura Empire's cuisine at this port~ That's wonderful~
skins.secretaryTouch: I've heard that hugs help people relax~ Shall we test that theory, Commander?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: That's naughty, Commander! You'll be unpopular with the girls if you keep doing stuff like this.

skins.shipDescription: The summer's scorching heat is alleviated by the ocean~ Commander, why don't you set aside your worries and... cut loose a bit~?
skins.acquisition: The summer's scorching heat is alleviated by the ocean~ Commander, why don't you set aside your worries and... cut loose a bit~?
skins.login: Commander? Did you doze off to the sound of the waves just now? Ahah, don't worry~ There's plenty of time, so you should enjoy your nap~
skins.details: I might get sunburnt? Ah, you're right, I should be more careful... Commander, would you mind helping me apply the sunscreen?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, would you like to try this sundae? Here, say "ahh~" Very good, very good~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Playing in the water seems like a lot of fun. Commander, shall we join them as well?
skins.secretaryIdle3: The rhythm of the waves is quite hypnotic... Commander, if you want to take a nap, just come lie down over here and let me take good care of you~
skins.secretaryTouch: If there's anything you want me to do, just speak up~ Don't be shy~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Being at the beach always makes people more easygoing... I suppose I'll forgive you today~
